title: help with this font
content:
Any Idea what this is? thank you in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830055308im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ol_4482.jpg)
author: roglioro

comments.content:
to reference:  
 [Blippo Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830055308/http:/www.fonts.com/font/urw/blippo-black/poster-p)  
 [Pump Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830055308/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/elsnerflake/pump_bold_ot/)

you may check other weights, and also allow for alternate characters if they exist or just plain old customization.

some differences in the supplied logo vs web header as well:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830055308im_/http:/typophile.com/files/header_6297.jpg)
